title: Chemical Engineering Operator XR Experiential Learning: Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A faculty development program for pre-service or in-service teachers, targeting learners with limited chemical process field experience, enabling safe acquisition of core operational skills (reaction rates, separation processes) via XR simulations mirroring real work environments.

learning_goals: Perform basic operation procedures of chemical process equipment with 90% accuracy via XR-based mobile simulation.
Successfully apply response protocols for abnormal situations (e.g., leaks, overheating) in virtual reality environments at least three times.
Through team-based project evaluation, produce a chemical process operation standard manual with 80% completeness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
